callToAction: My name is Jianyin R. Call me Jian.  I have amassed almost a decade of Data Science experience specializing from ML model building to analytics products engineering. I have a passion for helping creatives achieving their goals while maintaining what makes them human: their inspiration. On my spare time, I dedicate my time to Pro Bono data consulting for non-profits around New York City.
buttonText: If you are a creative and want to learn how I can solve your data and automation issues, please book a meeting and fill out this form to tell me more about yourself.
